name: UnderLoop
description:
Dive into a new adventure to the looping underworld where something cursed is taking place, will you find your lost grandpa or you'll get lost too.

Armed by your note book and your brain The Under World react to your movement so choose Four Torches Wisely up or down to move. and make sure to map your way through its chambers and secrets .

Meet unique Characters,

and Most Importantly, DON'T GET LOST!!! 

The controls are simple

AD/left and right Arrow keys to Move

Space/W/Up Arrow to Jump

E/Shift/Enter to Interact

The Game was made with a Collab between me as a Coder and my sister as an Artist. and as entry to the Ludum Dare 47.

Background Music : Northern Lullaby by Sergey Cheremisinov

Tips and Trick: [Spoilers] only see them if you're stuck or wish to continue the story

Open the safe code by modifying the code by how you got into that room if the first torch is up add one to the first number or if it's down minus one to the first number, and so on for all of them.

each room has one way to get there and can be used again to arrive at the same room, so when you find something interesting, write what candles you've lighted to reach there again.

Check your bag to see what Items are you missing.
